name: BlockHero
description:
Lead the builder through all levels! Create blocks of the right size and release them on time!
Collect golden cubes, they will provide you with more attempts!

At first glance, it looks easy and simple, but in fact it is hardcore!
The game has 3 levels. Get to the last level and set your record!

The game is similar to the ones in the style of Block Puzzle!

🤣Have fun!🤣
